lines: 1. Nyasae oito norwaki,Nguba nekerwanero,Natokonye korw' obobeobwo bwatobuire;Omogambi bw' obobeOimokereirie igoro,Bong'ainereri' obonene'bekire 'kero eke;As' ens' etari mosani.
2. Ntokonyara kwerwanera,Bwango nigo toraitwe,'Monto nar' ogotokonya,Nyasae bwek' omorure;Mwaboria ning'o 'yo?n'kristo Yes' akorokwa;Omwan' o Nyasae;Bweka, onde tari,Orabue 'se 'segi.
3. Nebirecha bikaer' enseye,'Ganyete gotosiria,Titwayabeka 'moyo ime,Titogotobua 'ntwe;'Mogambi 'gosaria.Naba bun' arabe,Takonyara nonya,Nakio erikeire;"Ring'ana" narimoite.
4. Biblia se chinguru chiabo,Tageka tekoera,'Nki 'nkeba goikebue,Nyasae arigete bweka;Nachitour' obogima,Nibo, bana, Nyomba,Ng'eria yabo nenke;Bionsi nabisire oNyasae otigare.
